name: 5 seconds to not reboot
description:
5 seconds to not reboot is a game develop for Gamedev.tv game jam. 

You have 5 seconds and multiple lives to finish a level. Use your previous lives to create platforms for your next run.

Thanks for the team : 

- Lucas Alibert

- Guilhem Barboux

- Sebastien Derramond

Sources :

https://gitlab.com/GuilhemBarboux/5secondstonotreboot
